cast.name: 亚特乔姆·吉尔茨 Artjom Gilz

writer.name: 林恩·乌纳·鲍尔 Lynn Oona Baur

director.name: 林恩·乌纳·鲍尔 Lynn Oona Baur

this_title: Manchmal denke ich plötzlich an Dich
introduction: Graphic designer Lilith lives with her boyfriend Adam and is expecting their first baby. A mini-break on the stormy island of Hallig Hooge becomes a journey through the young woman’s emotions. She imagines what it would be like to have the baby and grapples with her role as woman and mother. When she meets 6-year old Lulu and a mysterious woman in oilskins, strange things start happening. Lilith realizes that she has to make a decision which could change her life forever.
chinese_title: Manchmal denke ich plötzlich an Dich
